channel.title: The Nonintuitive Bits
channel.description: Two and a half engineers, three different viewpoints. At the intersection of technology, business, gaming and psychology, get a second opinion about the issues of the day in the tech industry. Each opinion is held only the host sharing it (and not by our employers). *Warning:* The host may no longer hold that opinion by the end of the episode.

item.description:
- Sicario Moe: A cinematic critique
- Examining game expansions: John Wick's perspective DLC
- 'The Boys': Comic vs TV Series contrast
- ChargerPT – An AI Assist for software engineering fundamentals
- Unpacking the Unity game engine's move towards manufacturing
- John Deere's AI Agritech revolution
- Unveiling the technical challenges of internet dependency
- Emergence of tech monopolies and ecosystem implications
- The Right to Repair and the Modern Device maze
- Reflecting on farming's digital shift and food production reliance on tech
- Addressing satellite network disruptions & crop collection impacts
- Cyber Security in an Automated World: Threats and Safeguards
- Shipping Software Vulnerabilities: An Insight into Container Management
- MH370: Netflix's exploration of a modern aviation mystery
- Mentor Pilot: A must-follow for aviation geeks
- Necessities of duplication & emergency systems in planes

Please join the Discord (https://discord.gg/T38WpgkHGQ) channel for the discussions.

item.itunes:title: AI Deep Dive: Model Reviews, Controversies, and Comparisons
item.title: AI Deep Dive: Model Reviews, Controversies, and Comparisons
item.itunes:summary: # Show Notes:* Personalized Zoom meeting jingles.* Features and anticipation of PlayStation 5 Pro and PlayStation Portal.* ChargeGPT use-cases for daily commuting.* Loving the LEGO STS Space Launch System model!* Latest update on Voyager 1 repair.* Advanced motorcycle features, like LCD screens with phone integration and ABS.* Exploring the Harley Davidson Panamerica and Honda CB400.* Tesla's influence on daily commuting with autopilot features.* Introductory explanation of context caching in...
item.description:
# Show Notes:
* Personalized Zoom meeting jingles.
* Features and anticipation of PlayStation 5 Pro and PlayStation Portal.
* ChargeGPT use-cases for daily commuting.
* Loving the LEGO STS Space Launch System model!
* Latest update on Voyager 1 repair.
* Advanced motorcycle features, like LCD screens with phone integration and ABS.
* Exploring the Harley Davidson Panamerica and Honda CB400.
* Tesla's influence on daily commuting with autopilot features.
* Introductory explanation of context caching in LLMs.
* Unwrapping the potential of NVIDIA's recent model and Ilya Sutskever's new venture.
* OpenAI's LLM team and their tackling of challenges.
* Honoring Grok and Ilyas Uskever's remarkable contributions to Chat GPT.
* A comparative analysis of different AI models in the market.
* Insight into Elon Musk's AI contributions.
* A comprehensive guide to building a new LLM model.
* Investigating the US-China competition in AI.
* Cloud Opus vs. Chat GPT – A debate.
* How OpenAI model handles criticism.
* Introducing: Google's Gemini options.
* Google Jamboard's discontinuation in December 2024.
* Spotlight on PvKK – A unique simulation game set in an imaginary world.
* Discussing the rising popularity of simulation games.

Join us for more discussions on our [Discord Channel](https://discord.gg/T38WpgkHGQ)!
item.content:encoded:
# Show Notes:
* Personalized Zoom meeting jingles.
* Features and anticipation of PlayStation 5 Pro and PlayStation Portal.
* ChargeGPT use-cases for daily commuting.
* Loving the LEGO STS Space Launch System model!
* Latest update on Voyager 1 repair.
* Advanced motorcycle features, like LCD screens with phone integration and ABS.
* Exploring the Harley Davidson Panamerica and Honda CB400.
* Tesla's influence on daily commuting with autopilot features.
* Introductory explanation of context caching in LLMs.
* Unwrapping the potential of NVIDIA's recent model and Ilya Sutskever's new venture.
* OpenAI's LLM team and their tackling of challenges.
* Honoring Grok and Ilyas Uskever's remarkable contributions to Chat GPT.
* A comparative analysis of different AI models in the market.
* Insight into Elon Musk's AI contributions.
* A comprehensive guide to building a new LLM model.
* Investigating the US-China competition in AI.
* Cloud Opus vs. Chat GPT – A debate.
* How OpenAI model handles criticism.
* Introducing: Google's Gemini options.
* Google Jamboard's discontinuation in December 2024.
* Spotlight on PvKK – A unique simulation game set in an imaginary world.
* Discussing the rising popularity of simulation games.

Join us for more discussions on our [Discord Channel](https://discord.gg/T38WpgkHGQ)!
